channel.title: Excel on Martin Chorley
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on Martin Chorley

item.title: 100 Movies in the Cinema in 1 Year
item.description: After reading this blog post at the end of January I decided that watching at least 100 movies in the cinema in a year was the kind of challenge I could get behind. Last year’s challenge to get fit and healthy was fairly successful and seemed like much harder work than going to the cinema a few times could ever be. After all, 100 movies a year is less than 2 a week, so it must be easy, right?
